item.title: Software Architect and System Programmer (South Bay area)
item.description:
We are looking for a talented software architect and system programmer to develop the foundation of a set of new tools and user interface applications using our cutting-edge 3D technology. The client has a sophisticated 3D camera that needs your software solutions, applications, and tools to enable new methods of interacting with PC and TV appliances. We need a creative programmer who is passionate about elevating the user interface experience by developing the underlying video imaging system and driver technology. You join an existing team of industry-recognized programmers who have years of experience writing algorithms to extract 3D information from our client's hardware. You will build dynamic and efficient software using this 3D and color information to drive new user experiences.Â 

Responsibilities

  • Define the application system and driver architecture and its components in Windows and other platforms including Linux (Unix)
  • Design and develop software components for the proposed architecture
  • Design and develop user interface applications that illustrate a rich user interface for manipulating digital media such as pictures, music, and video
  • Integrate your code with Vista and Windows 7 drivers
  • Port the design to other platforms
  • Take leadership responsibility for integrating all the necessary software and hardware components for delivering a complete solution

Required Advanced-Level Skills

  • Strong experience building rich multi-threaded Windows applications
  • Detailed understanding of USB and other communication protocols
  • Excellent software architecture and component development skills

Required Intermediate-Level Skills

  • Experience in defining and implementing a system software architecture
  • 2D and 3D graphics programming in GDI and DirectX
  • Good design, communication and documentation skills
  • Software leadership experience
  • Proficient in using computer development languages and tools including Visual C/C++

Required Familiarity-Level Skills

  • * Familiarity with DDK/WDK and low level operating system layers
  • * BS or higher in CS or related

Job Type: Full-Time
City: Sunnyvale
State/Province: California [CA]
Compensation & Benefits Overview: Great benefits with a variety of packages
